dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Our human friends grew scared that the big, bad, scary Bloodfiends might come back to hurt them again.

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Spending every hour of the night trembling in fear of no-good Bloodfiends... not getting even a wink of rest.

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: And you know how important sleep is to skin maintenance. A bad sleep cycle is a leading cause of hair loss and various nasty skin conditions!

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: That's when a Fixer, righteous and just, comes up with an idea most ingenious.

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: And I mean really, what if...

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: ... We could create a place in which humans and Bloodfiends may coexist in happy harmony?

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: There, the kindly Bloodfiends will protect humans from evil Bloodfiends... while humans will voluntarily share their blood with the kindly Bloodfiends.

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: How's that? Now isn't that really an idea most ingenious?
Yet... 'tis an impossible task. How can humans coexist with Bloodfiends, those villains who have naught but the base craving for human blood in their craven hearts...?

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Well, it's only natural that such grand, impressive ideals would be met with some resistance.

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: But a great leader is often flanked by capable vassals who help them realize their ambitions... And soon...

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: La Manchaland was born! La Manchaland, where your smiles of joy bloom. La Manchaland, where everyone can dream free!

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Look around, all! Look at all the smiling Bloodfiends, giving you a toothy grin!
